Package org.dotplot.core.services

Provides the Service-Framework.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IContext This interface serves as supertype of all contexts.
IErrorHandler Handler for error which can occure in the service framework.
IFrameworkContext  
IJob<C extends IFrameworkContext>  
IRessource  
IService<F extends IFrameworkContext,S extends IServiceHotSpot> Invoking sequence; constructor setFrameworkContext() setWorkingContext() run() getResultContext()
IServiceExtentionActivator  
IServiceHotSpot  
IServiceRegistry A registry for Services.
ITask  
ITaskPart Interface for TaskParts.
ITaskProcessor<Invoker>  
ITaskResultMarshaler  
 

Class Summary
AbstractJob<C extends IFrameworkContext> Default implementation of the interface IJob.
AbstractService<F extends IFrameworkContext,S extends IServiceHotSpot> Default implementation of the interface IService.
AbstractTaskPart Default implementation of the interface ITaskPart.
DefaultErrorHandler Defaultimplementation of the interface IProcessingErrorHandler.
Extention  
NullContext Instances of this class represent contexts with no contend and should be used rather then returning the nullpointer.
ServiceHotSpot Default implementation of the IServiceHotSpot interface.
ServiceRegistry A Registry for Services.
Structure  
Task Default implementation of the ITask interface.
TaskProcessor Default implementation of the interface ITaskProcessor.
 

Exception Summary
IllegalContextException Exception thrown if a Context is illegal.
IllegalServiceExtentionException Exception thrown if an Extention is illegal.
InsufficientRessourcesException Exception thown to indicate insufficient ressources.
ServiceException  
UnknownServiceHotSpotException Exception to indicate an unknown ServiceHotSpot.
 

Package org.dotplot.core.services Description

Provides the Service-Framework.

For overviews, tutorials, examples, guides, and tool documentation, please see:
